name: Sphere Toss 4
description:
Sphere Toss 4 is a fast paced puzzle game. Your goal in this game is to toss all the balls across the polygon while avoiding hitting the rotating ball patterns in the middle.

LEVELS:
The game itself consists of 200 unique levels, each one harder than the previous one. There are lots of things which you have to take into account.

NUMBER OF ROTATING BALLS - the difficulty greatly depends on the number of enemy balls
SPEED OF ENEMY BALLS - also, the speed at which the balls move is very important for difficulty determination
ARRANGEMENT OF ENEMY BALLS - the pattern into which the balls are arranged is important as well


The number of your goal balls which you have to shoot across varies from level to level. Be fast, but be calculated and smart as well!
